initialQuestion.text: How many people were at the event, roughly?

context.text: According to organizers, over 500 people attended the rally

questions.text: At what time did the event start?

context.text: We started gathering really early, and had good numbers by noon. There was a big group of us in the east and a smaller group in the west, and we met up around lunchtime.

questions.text: At what time did the event end?

context.text: Protests continued late into the evening, said officials. It was well after sundown before crowds calmed down enough to be dispersed by police.
